typeSystemDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.typesystems.AverbisInternalTypeSystem
typeSystemDescription.description: A type system for internal types not representing specific information.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.extraction.types.CoreAnnotation
typeDescription.description: The base type for all annotation types providing a componentId and confidence.

featureDescription.name: componentId
featureDescription.description: The id/name of the component that created this annotation.

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: Confidence value of the current annotation. E.g. in the case the annotation has been created by a statistical analysis engine.
